Description.Text: Location This hotel lies close to Vistahermosa just 15 km from the nearest beach. There is a ski resort some 32 km away and links to the public transport are a stone's throw away (500 m). Facilities The apartment hotel was built in 1992. The air-conditioned hotel comprises a total of 18 rooms. At the accommodation, travellers are welcomed at the reception area with 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-in/check-out service. The upper floors of the apartment hotel can be accessed by lift. Amenities include a safe and a currency exchange service. Internet access in public areas allows guests to stay connected. Various gastronomic options are available, including a restaurant, a café and a bar. There is also a garden. Additional facilities at the hotel include a playroom. Travellers arriving by car can leave their vehicles in the garage or in the car park. Available services and facilities include room service and a laundry service. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, central heating, a kitchen and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony with a view for guests' enjoyment. The carpeted accommodation units feature a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar are also available. Additional features include a fridge and a tea/coffee station. Internet access, a telephone and a TV add to the comfort of the holiday. A hairdryer is provided in the bathrooms. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. The sun loungers and parasols on the sun terrace offer a great place to unwind. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. Tennis and golf are available to active guests. Water sports enthusiasts are offered aquafit. The accommodation offers a range of services in the wellness area, such as a spa, a sauna, a steam bath, a beauty salon and a solarium, and for an additional fee, massage treatments. Fun and entertainment are offered by a casino. Meals Half board is bookable. Guests can choose to book options such as breakfast, lunch or dinner. Staff are also happy to provide special dietary cuisine. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the apartment hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
